title: Commanding Heights : Anand Panyarachun | on PBS

quotes: In 1995, 1996 there was practically zero growth of our exports, and there was beginning to accumulate the current account deficit.

time_markers.text: a couple of years before the [Asian] crisis
quotes: A couple of years before the [Asian] crisis, the U.S. had intervened heavily in Mexico, [where] there was a crisis with the peso.

time_markers.text: at the time of the Cold War, the Vietnam War
quotes: even though at the time of the Cold War, the Vietnam War, we were a significant factor or player in this region

organizations.name: U.S. government
quotes: Do you think that, just as here in Thailand people thought the government will protect the exchange rate, there was a general perception in the region that the U.S. government would intervene if there was some crisis, like they had done in Mexico,
A couple of years before the [Asian] crisis, the U.S. had intervened heavily in Mexico, [where] there was a crisis with the peso.

Do you think that, just as here in Thailand people thought the government will protect the exchange rate, there was a general perception in the region that the U.S. government would intervene if there was some crisis, like they had done in Mexico,
I'm sure an average Mexican knows that [he] lives next door to the great American state, and there was already this intertwining historical relationship and economic relationship.
